amendment.description: To require a strategy to promote United States interests in the Indo-Asia-Pacific region.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1708 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1708 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 1463.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1708 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1708 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 1463.
